subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: John Isner reached the finals of the Regions Morgan Keegan Championships in Memphis with a 7-5, 4-6, 6-3 victory over Philipp Petzschner of Germany.
snippet: John Isner reached the finals of the Regions Morgan Keegan Championships in Memphis with a 7-5, 4-6, 6-3 victory over Philipp Petzschner of Germany.
